title: Miles2006
author: Miles2006
content: 20 October 2020A day Nigerians will never forget, 3 years remembrance, ENDSARS. Dear Nigerians remember that on this day 20th of October 2020 the endsars movement was formed to fight the suffering, harassment, unjust detentions, continuous abuses.Some Nigerians youth who protested peacefully because they were tired of the abuses and suffering were murdered and brutalize by angry soldiers at lekki toll gate.I kept on wondering who sent the gun men to murder and injure peaceful protesters but no answer. Today we honour the youths and heros who sacrificed there lifes at the endsars toll gate in lekki.On this sombre three years anniversary the youths of Nigeria demands: release all political prisoners accountability and compensation for grieving families and including dignified burials. permanent memorial at lekki toll gate release of all judicial inquiry reports  prosecution: youths demands justice for souls lost on 20 October 2020Rest in peace to those we lost at lekki toll gateSource: https://socialistworkersleague.org/2023/10/07/endsars-3rd-year-memorial-a-resounding-call-for-justice-and-unwavering-remembrance-of-our-heroes/

comments.author: Justbillywitt
comments.body: R.I.P to all Nigerians who lost their lives at the Lekki toll gate. It's such a shame that what the Nigerian you were demanding for for 3 years ago are still unresolved. I pray that one day Nigeria will be liberated from the hands of those that are destroying the country. What baffles me is that some youths will still be praising these old leaders who has continually been recycling themselves into political offices.

comments.author: adultcrypto
comments.body: We will never forget 20.10.20, the date democracy, demand for good governance and human right was killed in Nigeria. We missed the opportunity for our voices to be heard and the 1% elite assume immutable and immortality same day. The electoral violence of 2023, abuse of office, human right abuse and police brutality have come to stay just because the mission of 20.10.20 failed. The same people that ordered the killings are now in power, where do we run to? I don't know how long darkness will rule over us! I am not seeing any help coming soon because all the institutions and agencies have been bought. Our solace is now on God even though He has given us everything with which to prosper.

comments.author: iBaba
comments.body: I want to especially send my sincere condolences to the family of those young people that were killed during the Lekki toll gate saga and a rest well message to the souls of the deceased on that unfortunate incident. What actually transpired in that incident is a bizarre adventure to me and I don't know why we had to lose those young guys to that incident. Everyone had it's own opinion to the incident but my humble opinion was that they could have avoided that violence if they had went back home immediately after the peaceful protest. Some celebrities were at that event but they did not encounter the incident because they left for their homes after the protest was said to have been called off but the bitterness in some of the youths could have triggered those casualties. We also heard that the project was highjacked by some bad influences that were sponsored to cause damages but I think God knows best what actually happened.Regardless of whatever it was that happened, the army is nor suppose to shoot. You don't shoot innocent and unharmed citizens in the name of provocation. That's a bad decision that the army made.I also don't think the government handled the case properly. There's not enough transparency and wide condemnation of the incident and the decision of the army by the government itself.However the case, it sent some messages to the government itself and the uniform men to be more professional in their duty and value for life.
